trans-unit.source: The ISEAddOnToolCollection Object
trans-unit.target: ISEAddOnToolCollection 物件

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: The ISEAddOnToolCollection Object
trans-unit.target: ISEAddOnToolCollection 物件

trans-unit.source: The **ISEAddOnToolCollection** object is a collection of **ISEAddOnTool** objects.
trans-unit.target: **ISEAddOnToolCollection** 物件是 **ISEAddOnTool** 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: An example is the **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.VerticalAddOnTools** object.
trans-unit.target: **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.VerticalAddOnTools** 物件即為一例。

trans-unit.source: Methods
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: Add\( Name, ControlType, \[IsVisible
trans-unit.target: Add\( Name, ControlType, \[IsVisible

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 與更新的版本中支援，而且不存在於之前的版本。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new add\-on tool to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將新的附加元件工具新增至集合。

trans-unit.source: It returns the newly added add\-on tool.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回最近新增的附加元件工具。

trans-unit.source: Before you run this command, you must install the add\-on tool on the local computer and load the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 執行此命令之前，您必須在本機電腦上安裝附加元件工具並載入組件。

trans-unit.source: **Name** – String Specifies the display name of the add\-on tool that is added to Windows PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: **Name** – 字串：指定要新增至 Windows PowerShell ISE 的附加元件工具顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: **ControlType** –Type Specifies the control that is added.
trans-unit.target: **ControlType** – 類型：指定新加入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: **\[IsVisible\]** – optional Boolean If set to **$true**, the add\-on tool is immediately visible in the associated tool pane.
trans-unit.target: **\[IsVisible\]** – 選擇性布林值：如果設定為 **$true**，附加元件工具會立即顯示在相關聯的工具窗格中。

trans-unit.source: Remove\( Item
trans-unit.target: Remove\( Item

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 與更新的版本中支援，而且不存在於之前的版本。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified add\-on tool from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除指定的附加元件工具。

trans-unit.source: **Item** – Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEAddOnTool Specifies the object to be removed from Windows PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: **Item** – Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEAddOnTool：指定要從 Windows PowerShell ISE 移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: SetSelectedPowerShellTab\( psTab
trans-unit.target: SetSelectedPowerShellTab\( psTab

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 與更新的版本中支援，而且不存在於之前的版本。

trans-unit.source: Selects the PowerShell tab that the **psTab** parameter specifies.
trans-unit.target: 選取 **psTab** 參數指定的 PowerShell 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: **psTab** – Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTab The PowerShell tab to select.
trans-unit.target: **psTab** – Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTab：要選取的 PowerShell 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: Remove\( psTab
trans-unit.target: Remove\( psTab

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 與更新的版本中支援，而且不存在於之前的版本。

trans-unit.source: Removes the PowerShell tab that the **psTab** parameter specifies.
trans-unit.target: 移除 **psTab** 參數指定的 PowerShell 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: **psTab** – Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTab The PowerShell tab to remove.
trans-unit.target: **psTab** – Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.PowerShellTab：要移除的 PowerShell 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱
